bug_report.Bug:
12345<ID/ High High VIKA K 30.05.2022 Defect Open Windows 2010/SQL Server 2010
"Steps to Reproduce":{ "1": "Login into the Application", "2": "Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User", "3": "Filled out all the user information fields", "4": "Clicked on the ‘Save’ button", "5": "Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error…”", "6": "See the attached logs for more information (Attach more logs related to the bug..IF any)", "7": "Also see the attached screenshot of the error page", "Expected Result": "On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully”", "(Attach ‘application crash’ screenshot. IF any)"},
